acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements
Then the Set<?> [java.lang.Object@2b917fb0, java.lang.Object@3c4262d1, java.lang.Object@77a2aa4a, java.lang.Object@47ad69f7, java.lang.Object@5e5073ab] should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements

Then the Map<?, ?> {java.lang.Object@128c502c=java.lang.Object@629adce, java.lang.Object@65eabaab=java.lang.Object@6a282fdd, java.lang.Object@1de9d54=java.lang.Object@743c6ce4, java.lang.Object@45667d98=java.lang.Object@70331432, java.lang.Object@7123be6c=java.lang.Object@3bbf9027} should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly 5 elements
